verses.content: Chun, Saula a thi hnungin, David chu Amalek mihai rûnnaa inthawkin a hung a, David chu Ziklag khuoa ni hni a um hnung chun,

a ni thum ni chun, ngai ta, mi pakhat an ṭhanghmuna inthawk Saula kuoma mi chu a puonhai tlêr nengnungin le a lua pilvut kai nung hin a hung a; chun, David kuomah a hung tlung chun hnuoia bawkkhupin chibai a bûk a.
David chun a kuomah, “Khaw laia inthawka hung am i nih a?” a ta; ama chun, “Israel mihai ṭhanghmuna inthawkin ka hung tlân suok a nih,” a ta.

Chun, David chun a kuomah, “Ieng angin am thil a um a, mi hril ta khai?” a ta. Ama chun a dawn a, “Indonaa inthawk chun mihai chu an tlânseh a, mi tamtak chu an tluh a, an thi tâwl a, chun, Saula le a naupa Jonathan khawm an thi ve a,” a ta.
Chun, David chun a hriltu tlangvâl kuoma chun, “Iengtin am Saula le a naupa Jonathan chu an thi ti i hriet a?” a ta.

A hriltu tlangvâl chun, “Iengtin tin amanih Gilboa tlânga chun ka lo um kher a; chun, ngai ta, Saula chu a fei ringsana ngîr ka hmuh a, chun, tawlailîrhai le sakawr chung chuong mihai chun an hung hnai ta hle el a.
Chun, a hnungtieng a hung ngha chun a mi hei hmuh a, a mi hei ko a. Chun, kei chun, ‘Hitaka hin ka um ie,’ tiin ka dawn a.
Chuongchun, ka kuomah, ‘Tu am i nih a?’ tiin a mîn dawn a. Chun, kei chun, ‘Amalek mi ka nih,’ tiin ka dawn a.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, ‘Ka kâwla hin ngîr la, mi hung that el ta, ka la dam ting a, lunginzîngnain a mi tlâkkhum ta sih a,’ a ta.

Chuongchun, a kâwla chun ka ngîr a, chuonga tlu dêr ta hnung chu a dam zo ta âwm hrim hrima ka hriet naw leiin ka that ta el a, a lua lallukhum le bânbun chu ka lâk a, ka pu kuomah hitaka hin ka hung lâk a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun ama silfênhai chu a chel a, a keithlêr tah a, chuong ang bawk chun a kuoma mi um po pohai chun an thaw veh a;
chuongchu, Saula le a naupa Jonathan le LALPA mihai le Israel sûnghai chun an sûn a, an ṭah a, zântieng chenin bu an nghei a, kâwlhnâma sukhlum an ni tâk leiin.
Chun, David chun a hriltu tlangvâl kuoma chun, “Khâwtieng mi am i nih a?” a ta. Ama chun, “Hmêl- mak mi, Amalek mi naupa ka nih,” a tih a, a dawn a.
Chun, David chun a kuomah, “LALPA hrieknâl sukbohmang dinga a chunga kutthlâk chu iengtiziea ṭi lo am i nih a?” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun tlang- vâlhai laia mi pakhat chu a ko a, “Va hnai la, va that rawh,” a ta. Chun, a va sât a, a thi tah a.
Chun, David chun a kuomah, “I thisen chu nangma lu chung ngeiah um raw se, nangma bâu ngeiin, ‘LALPA hrieknâl chu ka that a nih,’ tiin a phuong si cheh a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun Saula le a naupa Jonathan chu hi ṭaphla hin a ṭah a,
chun, thal hla chu Juda thlahai inchûktir dingin a tir tâwl a, ngai ta, Jaser bua chun ziek a nih.
Aw Israel, i ropuina chu i bâwlhmunahai that a na, Mi thilthawtheihai an tlu ta hi!
Gath-a chun hril naw unla, Askelon kawtthlêrahai chun phuong bawk naw ro; Chuong naw chun Philistin naunuhai lâwm an ta, Sertan lo naunuhai hlimin khêk pal rawi an tih.

Nangni Gilboa tlânghai, In chungah dâidâw le ruo khawm tla naw raw se; thil inhlân ding khawm insuo bawk naw ro. Chutaka chun mi thilthawthei phaw chu tirdakumtakin an pei sih a; Saula phaw, hrieknâl lo mi phaw ang elin.
Thathai thisena inthawk le, mi thilthawthei thâua inthawk chun, Jonathan thal chu a lêt nawh a; Saula kâwlhnâm chu a thlâwnin a lêt bawk nawh.
Saula le Jonathan umdân chu dit a umin a mâwi a, An thi khawma an inṭhe nawh; Mupuihai nêkin an ṭuonrang lem a, Sakeibakneihai nêkin an hrât lem.
Nangni Israel naunuhai, Saula chu ṭa ro, Puon sen mawihaia inthuom cheu a, In puonahai rângkachaka cheimawinahai belpêktu cheu chu.
Indo lai taka mi thilthawtheihai an tlûk el chu! I bâwlhmunahai Jonathan chu an that tah.
Ka unaupa Jonathan, i chungthua hin ka lunginzîng a nih; Ka chungah i ṭha êm êm hlak a, I mi hmangaina chu a mak a, Nuhmei hmangaina chu a khûm dai a nih.
Mi thilthawtheihai chu an tluh a, Indona thuomhnawhai khawm a bohmang zo tah!
